attributes.action: Do not attack Syria without proper evidence.
attributes.background: We feel that attacking Syria without confirmed evidence is wrong, this should never have happened without at least being debated in parliament.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure under what circumstances you would like the UK Government to take military action in Syria. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/217369
